document_data.name: ''Inshula's Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Inshula's armor''''' was a unique set of [[light armor]] worn by [[Inshula sar Mashewe]], a mercenary hunter from the nation of [[Tashalar]] active in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: This light armor was custom-tailored to fit Inshula's lanky, muscular form. It was [[enchanted]] to improve the wearer's defense and was especially effective against beast attacks.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, the armor accompanied its owner on her travels from [[Tashluta]] to the jungles of [[Samarach]] and whilst working with [[Sword Coast]] adventurers for the merchant [[Sa'Sani]] of [[Samargol]].
